creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure leaning on a desk with his PL fist, watching another male figure, seated on a bench in front of the desk, writing; lightly sketched background
markings: violet stamp on recto, LR: Samuel Isham Collection/NYPL, Lugt 1402
provenance: Samuel Isham Collection, New York Public Library, Lugt 1402. [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold October 16, 1991, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Sergeant Reporter
